ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... have ... RIGHT! I just learned this in Mistmoore, well okay I learned it on this list after Mistmoore (see Is Selo s a Megataunt? )  huge difference, Huge
ygData.messageBody:
>I used to get aggroed on a lot in sol a. Then I learned that if I don't
have
>a song playing when the puller comes back, they almost never turn to me. 2
>nights ago in the king room, I got hit less than ten times over the course
>of 3 hours. Usually I wait till the puller enters the room, turns and the
>warrior and the rogue (puller) have started swinging. Then I fire up my
>songs and I get left alone.


RIGHT! I just learned this in Mistmoore, well okay I learned it on this list
after Mistmoore (see "Is Selo's a Megataunt?") huge difference, Huge HUGE
difference..

*WHEW*

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, Povar
